meanings.sent1: She touched her chins to feel the soft skin.
meanings.sent2: He had two chins, one strong and one delicate.
meanings.sent3: The chins of the family were all distinct in shape.
meanings.sent4: The chins of the clock pointed to different hours.
meanings.sent5: The chins of the mountain range were majestic against the sky.

meanings.definition: A protruding part of the face below the mouth, formed by the apex of the lower jaw.
meanings.sent1: His chins quivered with excitement as he spoke.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched her chin to soothe the ache.
meanings.sent3: The chins of the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The chins of the building jutted out like balconies.
meanings.sent5: The chins of the puppy were soft and warm to the touch.
